sentences.en: The hostages emerged from their ordeal unscathed.
sentences.cn: 各人质历尽磨难后安然生还。

sentences.en: East Los Angeles was left relatively unscathed by the riots.
sentences.cn: 相对来说，洛杉矶东部没有受到骚乱的损害。

sentences.en: Tony emerged unscathed apart from a severely bruised finger.
sentences.cn: 托尼结果除了一个手指严重淤青外，没受别的伤。
